full_translation:
**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of Soaring Through the Three Realms and Communing with Subtle Inner Contemplation**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of Soaring Through the Three Realms and Communing with Subtle Inner Contemplation*. Author unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties or the Sui-Tang period. Not recorded in the *Catalogue of Numinous Treasure Scriptures*. One scroll. Base text from the *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity Tradition*, Peace Section.

---

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
The Supreme Numinous Treasure enables flight through the Three Realms and the concealed preservation of the Supreme Dao. Those who maintain a prolonged fast and cultivate practice for a hundred days will find all illnesses dispelled, their complexion radiant, white hair restored to black, and fallen teeth regrown. After two hundred days of practice, marrow fills the bones, the intestines transform into sinews, scars and burns vanish, and stiffness, muteness, blindness, and deafness are cured, restoring sight and hearing. After three hundred days, one may pass through barriers without obstruction, command ghosts and spirits, ascend into the void, tread upon floating clouds, and roam freely to reach the Kunlun Mountains. After three years, one attains the Dao and achieves Perfection, wandering the Eight Extremities, riding a chariot drawn by qilin, with white tigers as attendants and azure dragons sweeping the dust. After five years, one summons and roams the Three Realms, ascending to the rank of Immortal King.

The subtlety of these words lies in the Dao being magnified through human effort. How could this be mere idle discourse? Truly, the Emperor upholds and magnifies it, for the Dao endures while humanity perishes. How vast is the treasury of the Supreme Numinous Treasure!

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
The *Numinous Treasure Supreme Perfected Scarlet Yang Elixir of the Sun’s Radiance, Jade Token for Ascending to Heaven*, is secretly preserved in the Golden Tower of the Jade Capital Mountain in the Upper Palace. It is not transmitted to those without the destiny of immortality—only to those whose rank corresponds to Immortal King, Immortal Duke, or Immortal Minister. If you encounter this, it is because your predestined karmic affinity has been recorded in the Upper Clarity, and you must present credentials and swear an oath to receive it.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Master and disciple must each observe a thirty-day fast, followed by a three-day joint fast. Expel all impurities, seek emptiness and numinosity, and await a response in that very moment. Only then may you inscribe the talisman, wear it, and proceed with the practice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Consume and refine qi, exhale and inhale essence, preserve the spirit in stillness, and gird yourself with the Supreme Perfected.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
After twenty-one days in seclusion, you will behold the Perfected Spirits. Transformation occurs in an instant—short and long shift, sources are moved, flows are blocked, and the Scarlet Yang is ingested.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Refine the Eight Stones with water to fix gold, boil sand to ascend, and swallow the Yin of the Elixir.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Contemplate the spirit of the Dao in your heart, dwell in immortal wanderings, and await the traces of longing to ingest the Responsive Yang.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
The talisman is ethereal and distant—gaze toward the luminous peaks, yearn upward to watch the clouds and think of celestial blessings, desiring to ascend the void and ride the clouds to reach Heaven.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
When the Dao is achieved, you will wear all its emblems and ascend Mount Hua. Only upon reaching the celestial steps may you suddenly ingest it.

Consume and refine qi, exhale and inhale essence, preserve the spirit in stillness, and gird yourself with the Supreme Perfected. After twenty-one days in seclusion, you will behold the Perfected Spirits.

---

**The Yin of the Supreme Perfected Numinous Treasure**

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Use a jade pouch to request and wear it; do not tread upon defilement.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Jiazi, Jiaxu, Jiashen, Jiawu, Jiachen, and Jiayin, enter the fasting hall, face east, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Verdant forests and mysterious images, flowing waters—how do they fare? Fire blazes around the body—how can others know? The Dao comes to me, and the primordial qi harmonizes naturally."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Renshen, Renwu, Renchen, Renyin, Renzi, Renxu, Guiyou, Guiwei, Guisi, Guichou, Guihai, and Guimao, enter the fasting hall, face north, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"I wish to behold the Heavenly Mirror, the mysterious nourishment of the Jade Pool. Restore white to black, and remain ever an infant. The spirits come to me, and the Five Viscera follow."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Gengwu, Gengchen, Gengyin, Gengzi, Gengxu, Gengshen, Xinwei, Xinsi, Xinmao, Xinchou, Xinyou, and Xinhai, enter the fasting hall, face west, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Root child, root child, white clouds arise originally. Mist gathers across ten thousand leagues. May the numinous come to me, abide, and serve me. Return to the original movement, ending and beginning anew."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Bingyin, Bingzi, Bingxu, Bingshen, Bingwu, Bingchen, Dingmao, Dingchou, Dinghai, Dingyou, Dingwei, and Dingsi, enter the fasting hall, face south, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Vermilion Bird, Scarlet Pool, Heavenly Sea, Earthly River. I wish for immortality, to partake of perfect harmony, to match the Two Modes in longevity, and to attain ten thousandfold aspirations."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Wuchen, Wuyin, Wuzi, Wuxu, Wushen, Wuwu, Jisi, Jimao, Jichou, Jihai, Jiyou, and Jiwei, enter the fasting hall, face east, lie down with a level pillow, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Heavenly Dao, Heavenly Dao, I wish for agelessness, to match the Yellow Center in longevity, to rise with the sun at dawn. May my life be prolonged, and may I endure with the Dao."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of the Six Jia, when the po wanders the Mysterious Palace, visualize in your heart a divine person clad in white radiance, resembling a Jade Maiden.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of the Six Gui, when the hun resides in the Bladder, concentrate on the divine person within the kidneys, whose crimson radiance resembles a Jade Youth.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, every person possesses five hearts, their essence most profound, collectively called the Five Gate Child. Constantly visualize within your heart a single being, the primordial origin of divine transcendence. In their left hand, the Primordial Beginning; in their right, the Primordial Simplicity. Their left foot marks dawn; their right, dusk—both suffused with crimson qi. This is called the Primordial Lord, the abode of the Five Emperors. The lungs are the Stone Chamber; the liver, the Orchid Terrace. The heart’s seal is gold; the kidneys’ seal, silver.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring), purify yourself in fasting and face east, reciting the incantation: *"Eastern Azure Tooth, consume the Azure Tooth, drink the morning’s blossom."* The morning’s blossom lies beyond the lips—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Lixia* (Beginning of Summer), purify yourself in fasting and face south, reciting the incantation: *"Southern Vermilion Cinnabar, consume the Vermilion Cinnabar, drink from the Cinnabar Pool."* The Cinnabar Pool lies within the lips—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the months of the four seasons, purify yourself in fasting and face the sovereign, reciting the incantation: *"Central Yellow Wilds, towering Great Mountain, consume the primordial qi, drink from the Sweet Spring."* The Sweet Spring hangs above the suspended breastbone—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Liqiu* (Beginning of Autumn), purify yourself in fasting and face west, reciting the incantation: *"Western Luminous Stone, consume the Luminous Stone, drink the numinous fluid."* The numinous fluid rests upon the teeth—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter), purify yourself in fasting and face north, reciting the incantation: *"Northern Mystic Essence, consume the Mystic Essence, drink the Jade Nectar."* The Jade Nectar lies beneath the tongue—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, at midnight, visualize above the Cinnabar Pool the divine water and the five-colored qi of white clouds emerging from the Mysterious Gate, descending through the three pathways of the kidneys, ascending directly into the Crimson Palace, drifting beneath the Flowery Canopy, and returning to the Muddy Pellet.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the first day of the lunar month, the fifth, fifteenth, twenty-fifth, *Jiawu*, *Bingwu*, and *Wuwu* days, from dawn until noon, face the sun with unbound hair, lie supine with eyes closed, and visualize the sun as if it were the great solar orb, returning to the Crimson Palace to merge its virtue with yours, both nourishing the Crimson Palace. Then, visualize within your heart the Mysterious Canopy, beneath which lies the sun, and within the sun, a being called the Supreme Unity Jade Maiden, her form that of a youthful child, crimson qi circulating around the sun thirty times before halting at its center.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the sun. Constantly visualize your heart as radiant crimson like the sun, its crimson qi spreading in all directions, suffusing your entire body. Envision within your heart the sun, and within the sun, the Mysterious Canopy. Beneath the canopy stand three figures: on the left, the Primordial Beginning; on the right, the Supreme Unity of the Southern Culmen; and in the center, the Crimson Child. To your left, the Jade Maiden, consort of the Old Master, bearing a golden platter and jade bowl, offering divine wine and feeding you divine elixirs and sacred mushrooms. With time, the Six Ding spirits will arrive. Practice this from dawn until noon. The Supreme Mystery spirit ascends into the Muddy Pellet, the crimson qi entering the brain within the head, circling the mouth nine times before halting. The crimson qi descends into the Crimson Palace, proceeding directly to the Cinnabar Field, where it merges with the qi there.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the moon. Constantly visualize the Mystic Radiance Jade Maiden emerging above the divine water, standing upright, white qi resting upon the Numinous Tortoise, crowned with the Great Bright Star, its light illuminating your body. Practice this from midnight until noon. Enter the Great Abyss to merge with the Supreme Unity, the numinous descending once more. At the hour of *Renshen* (person’s hour), enter the Weak Waters, ascend Kunlun Mountain, and at midnight, bathe again in the Cinnabar Pool. The primordial qi flows evenly, ascending above the Numinous Tortoise to breathe—this is called the Primordial Unity. On the days of the new moon, full moon, and last day of the lunar month, also visualize thus: within the kidneys, a great Numinous Tortoise, its patterns five-colored, its form like woven silk, above it Mystic Radiance, below it divine water. White qi from the kidneys encircles the body once, the sun to the left, the moon to the right, ascending to the Upper Prime. On the days of the new moon, full moon, and the eight seasonal nodes, recite the incantation: *"Recorder of the Six Ding Jade Maidens, erase my name from the register of death. The Twelve Great Officers all proclaim: As decreed by the statutes of the Great Numinous Treasure."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the Dipper. Constantly visualize within the spleen the yellow qi, above which lie the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper. The Yellow Spirit Mystic Maiden, three inches in height, ascends to contemplate the Seven Stars of the Supreme Clarity of the Northern Dipper. The yellow qi enters your mouth, descending to envelop your entire body, merging in primordial chaos.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the stars, the essence of the Central Bright Star of the Supreme Ultimate. Constantly visualize within the Crimson Palace a youthful child, crimson as the sun, three figures standing together. The Supreme Unity’s crimson qi ascends to the Muddy Pellet. Then, visualize upon the forehead three stars, large as chicken eggs, crimson as the sun, their crimson qi entering the sun to connect with the spirit. The yellow essence enters the mouth, reaching the Supreme Mystery. Practice this on *Jiawu* and *Bingwu* days at noon.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, at midnight, visualize within the Supreme Ultimate Dipper eight stars, the Eight Chiefs perfectly round. At their center stands a crimson-clad figure, their patterns five-colored—this is your own body.

Then visualize within the Crimson Palace the Supreme Unity’s youthful child, and recite the incantation: *"The Three Radiances’ disciple, the minor manifestation of [your name], devoted to the Dao and long life, ascends through the Three Realms, having achieved triumphant return."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on *Jiazi*, *Jiaxu*, *Jiashen*, *Jiawu*, *Jiachen*, *Jiayin*, *Yichou*, *Yihai*, *Yiyou*, *Yiwei*, *Yisi*, and *Yimao* days, at dawn facing due east, sit within the purification hall. Visualize the liver spirit within your body, the Venerable Lord of the True Green, its green qi ascending to connect with heaven, the primordial qi of the Grand Clarity descending into your body. Circulate this qi throughout your entire form until after sunrise.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on *Bingyin*, *Bingzi*, *Bingxu*, *Bingshen*, *Bingwu*, *Bingchen*, *Dingmao*, *Dingchou*, *Dinghai*, *Dingyou*, *Dingwei*, and *Dingsi* days, at mid-morning, enter the purification hall and bow in reverence. Then visualize the youthful child of the Supreme Unity within the heart, crimson as the sun, your entire body suffused with true crimson qi ascending to connect with heaven. The crimson qi descends into your body; circulate this crimson qi throughout your entire form until noon.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on *Wuchen*, *Wuyin*, *Wuzi*, *Wuxu*, *Wushen*, *Wuwu*, *Jisi*, *Jimao*, *Jichou*, *Jihai*, *Jiyou*, and *Jiwei* days, at breakfast time, enter the purification hall and bow in reverence. Then visualize the yellow qi within the spleen ascending to connect with heaven, the central yellow qi descending into your body. Circulate this yellow qi throughout your entire form until the hour when the sun sets in the west.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on *Gengwu*, *Gengchen*, *Gengyin*, *Gengzi*, *Gengxu*, *Gengshen*, *Xinwei*, *Xinsi*, *Xinmao*, *Xinchou*, *Xinhai*, and *Xinyou* days, at mid-afternoon, enter the purification hall and bow in reverence. Then visualize the lung spirit, the Supreme Harmony of the True White, its white qi ascending to connect with heaven, the primordial qi of the Grand Beginning descending into your body. Circulate this white qi throughout your entire form until sunset.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on *Renshen*, *Renwu*, *Renchen*, *Renyin*, *Renzi*, *Renxu*, *Guichou*, *Guiyou*, *Guiwei*, *Guisi*, *Guimao*, and *Guihai* days, at the hour of human rest, enter the purification hall and bow in reverence. Then visualize the black qi of Weak Water, dense and surging, ascending to connect with heaven, the primordial qi of the Grand Mystery descending into your body. Circulate this primordial qi throughout your entire form until midnight.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, one must practice the *Muddy Pellet* visualization. Constantly visualize within the head a purple cloud emerging like a purple canopy, gradually expanding until it fills the horizon. The fluttering purple canopy’s qi directly enters the Supreme Ultimate. Visualize within the Crimson Palace the youthful child, the Jade Maiden of the Supreme Unity—three figures in all—seated beneath the purple canopy, holding a jade platter and golden cup, pouring wine, consuming divine elixir and sacred mushrooms. By constant visualization, one remains ageless, ascending through the Three Realms, passing the Celestial Emperor’s fasting examination.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, one must practice the *Three Sovereigns of the Supreme Ultimate*. Constantly visualize upon the forehead the Northern Dipper, above which are three stars resembling strung pearls, each as large as a chicken egg, their hues blending in primordial chaos. The yellow essence enters the mouth, descending to the Crimson Palace’s purple chamber within the Cinnabar Field. The essence-qi, true crimson, ascends into the eyes; cease after ninety breaths.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, one must practice the Dao of the *Grand Clarity*. On *Jiazi* days at dawn, enter the purification hall and silently visualize the crimson qi within the heart issuing from the mouth, striking the upper roots of the teeth, flowing gently and continuously. The five colors—green and yellow—directly enter the Central Canopy of the Grand Clarity; cease after ninety breaths. Practice this regularly from dawn until noon, constantly visualizing one person within each ear.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, one must practice the *Grand Primordium*. On the first, third, fifth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the month, as well as *Jiawu*, *Bingwu*, and *Wuwu* days, at any time of day, enter the purification hall facing east toward the sun, then sit facing due south at noon. One may also let down the hair and bow in reverence, reciting the incantation: *"The youthful child and Jade Maiden of the Supreme Unity constantly dwell within the Crimson Palace."* With eyes closed, visualize the crimson qi within the heart, its radiance merging with the sun’s essence. The sun’s essence and crimson qi descend, entering the nose and mouth; swallow them twenty-seven times and cease. Recite again: *"Sun Sovereign, Great Yang, divine, oh divine! Return to the Crimson Palace, unite with my virtue. Together, nourish the youthful child of the Crimson Palace."* Complete the practice.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, on the seventh and eighth days of the month, as well as *Gengshen* and *Wushen* days, at dusk, consume the essence of the lungs. Enter the purification hall and visualize the white qi within the lungs ascending and emerging from the mouth; swallow it twenty-one times and cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, on *Jiazi*, *Guihai*, the last day of the month, the new moon, and the full moon, at midnight enter the purification hall. Visualize the white qi between the kidneys, emerging like clouds from the two kidney orifices, ascending to roam beneath the Flowery Canopy, then directly entering the Mud Pill Palace. Descend into the Bubbling Spring, circulating throughout the entire body and cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, one must practice the Way of Lord Lao. On *Jiazi*, *Jiayin*, *Renzi*, *Renyin*, *Bingzi*, and *Bingyin* days, at dawn enter the purification hall. Visualize the liver’s qi as true blue-green, ascending from the Mud Pill Palace and directly entering the Great Clarity. The primordial qi of the Great Clarity descends into the body. Visualize the blue-green qi circulating throughout the entire body, completing the practice by mealtime.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, on *Wuchen*, *Wuyin*, *Wuzi*, *Wuxu*, *Wushen*, and *Wuwu* days, enter the purification hall. Visualize the yellow qi within the spleen standing upright, three inches in height, ascending directly into the North Star of the Central Ultimate. The yellow qi from the North Star descends into the body and cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, on *Jiazi*, *Jiawu*, the last day of the month, and the new moon, at midnight enter the purification hall. Visualize the Cinnabar Field situated behind the navel, six inches in diameter, radiant red like the sun. The primordial yang qi of the Five Lads surges like storm clouds—blue-green on the left, white on the right, with yellow qi at the center. Within it stands a red figure, nine fen in height. White qi covers it, red qi encircles it, and black qi envelops its exterior. Within, perceive this figure, its essence connecting to the Crimson Palace. Cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, one must practice the Way of the Hall of Light. At cock’s crow, mealtime, and sunset, enter the purification hall, performing this thrice daily. Visualize the Great Granary within the stomach, pure white like cream, filled with flourishing yellow qi. Cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight, one must practice the Way of the Central Ultimate.

On the days of the eight solar terms—Beginning of Spring, Spring Equinox, Beginning of Summer, Summer Solstice, Beginning of Autumn, Autumn Equinox, Beginning of Winter, Winter Solstice—as well as the first day of the twelfth lunar month and New Year’s Eve, at the hour of *rending*, enter the purification hall, face north upon the high seat, and pay homage to the Three Treasures and the ten directions. First to the north, then the east, then the south, then the west, then the northwest, then above, then the northeast, then the southeast, then below, then the southwest—each direction receiving one bow. Next, pay homage to the assembly of Great Sages in the four directions, three bows to each, completing the full circuit.

Recite: "Disciple of the Three Luminaries, so-and-so, from youth has cherished the Great Dao, desiring long life. Today, I beseech the Northern Lord of Grand Unity, the Director of Destinies, and the Recorder of Deeds to erase my name from the register of death and inscribe it in the register of long life." Thereupon, while lying down, visualize the Five Cities and Twelve Towers, with the Twelve Great Officers at their center, clad in vermilion robes, the waters of the River flowing through and distributing into the four limbs.

Then recite the incantation: "Jade Maidens of the Six Dings under the Recorder of Deeds, erase my name from the death tally and inscribe it in the jade register of divine immortals. My name is recorded in the Azure Register, and from this day forth, I shall transcend the Three Realms and roam beyond the Nine Heavens." Cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of the Numinous Treasure for soaring through the Three Realms, one must first practice the Way of the Rivers. Constantly visualize the surging, billowing clouds forming the rivers: the large intestine as the Yangtze, the small intestine as the Yellow River, the bladder as the Weak Water—the root of human life. The Jade Water is profoundly subtle; the rivers are supremely divine. Cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must practice the Way of Primordial Qi. On the days of *guihai*, *jiazi*, and the dark and new moons, at midnight, visualize the Weak Water and the churning clouds rising from between the kidneys. White qi converges and ascends, passing through the Five Palaces, entering the Mud Pill Palace above and the Bubbling Spring below, circulating throughout the body. Then visualize the Jade Maiden of Mystic Radiance ascending through the Central Channel, crowned with the Bright Star, illuminating the entire body. Primordial qi spreads in all directions. Cease at cock’s crow.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: One must practice the Way of Ease and Benefit. On the days of *jiazi*, *guihai*, and the eight solar terms—Beginning of Spring, Spring Equinox, Beginning of Summer, Summer Solstice, Beginning of Autumn, Autumn Equinox, Beginning of Winter, Winter Solstice—at midnight, enter the purification hall. Visualize the primordial qi of the Weak Water, dense and drifting, rising above the Flowery Canopy, moving like clouds and raining like showers, suffusing the entire body. Then visualize the Three Jade Maidens of the Grand Unity, the Purple Chamber Dao Lord, descending to irrigate the Cinnabar Field. The Jade Pool’s azure waters ascend, generating radiant blossoms. Next, visualize the primordial qi of the Great Clarity, swirling like clouds and mist, descending into the body, dense as clouds entering mountains, enduring for ten thousand generations. Cease.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must practice the Way of Gates and Doors. From the first to the fifteenth day of each lunar month, enter the purification hall and meditate in stillness. Visualize the ten fingers as gates and doors, with primordial qi flowing directly into them until all grow warm. The hun-soul emerges from within, guiding it to come and go. Cease after ninety breaths. From the sixteenth to the last day of the month, visualize the primordial qi descending to the ten toes until all grow warm. Cease after nine breaths.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must practice the Way of Mystic Transformation. On the day of *guihai*, at the hour of *rending*, enter the purification hall and visualize the inverted figure within the Mystic Grand Scripture, seven *cun* in height. Visualize the Mystic Mao and Qian as dry and yellow, then visualize the Mystic Lai as true black, its color drawn forth, moist and radiant. Cease at midnight.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must visualize the yellow essence and red qi of the sun descending into the mouth. Swallow it twenty-seven times. Then recite the incantation: "Lord of the Sun, Lady of the Moon, divine, divine! Return to the Crimson Palace, together nurturing the Jade Maidens of the Grand Unity, never departing from their palace." Recite this incantation three times. Then visualize the white qi from the lungs ascending to the mouth and swallow it twenty-one times. Next, recite the incantation: "Hongda attained the Dao; Taibai Ziqī, unite with me in virtue, that I may live long and never die." Recite this three times.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly visualize twelve stalks of lingzhi within the heart, their color a true vermilion jade, connected above to the lungs. This is called the "Thought Arrow." Grasp it with intention, and the Grand Unity’s wrath is drawn forth. The heart’s true roundness is called "Majestic Joy." These are the Celestial Grand Unity and the Dao Grand Unity. Constantly guard and contemplate them with focused attention.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly visualize the red qi of the heart descending to connect with the kidneys. Constantly visualize the white qi between the kidneys ascending into the heart, while the heart’s red qi descends into the kidneys. Between them, white qi ascends unceasingly for ten thousand generations. This is called the "Primordial Qi of Yin and Yang."

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly visualize the Grand Unity’s purple sash and golden seal, bearing the Jade Flower Talisman. The seal is called "Majestic Joy," the Heavenly Emperor’s trustworthy signet. Seven figures, each bearing a sword and holding a talisman, walk before you, halt behind you, sit to your left, and lie to your right. Constantly visualize and maintain this awareness.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly practice the Way of the Central Ultimate. Visualize the yellow figure above the spleen, three *cun* in height, with a yellow figure in each hand. Yellow qi ascends to heaven and descends into the body. Upon seeing this spirit, recite the incantation: "Yellow-robed one, Yellow-robed one, the Perfected One of the Yellow Court is within me. Fetch for me sweet wine, rich meats, divine lingzhi herbs, and all that may be consumed."

Then guide and swallow it, completing the process three to five times.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: The Supreme Dao of the Numinous Treasure’s hidden journey and soaring flight through the Three Realms cannot be sought without authenticity, nor learned without the Way. If one cultivates with precision for five years, one may transcend and wander the Three Realms, ascending to the Jade Capital—this is the utmost subtlety of the Three Caverns, the crown of all scriptures. Those who cultivate it should purify their hearts and sever all external entanglements. If one fails to do so, even after years of accumulation, nothing will be gained, and one will merely waste their years in vain observation—how lamentable!

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: The transmission of the covenant must adhere to the fivefold invocation of the ancient statutes, the jade instructions, and essential teachings. One must separately present three taels of refined gold and a bolt of life-thread silk, its length matching the recipient’s age. If you can study diligently, you may become a guest of the Supreme Lord, roaming the golden palaces and attaining the ranks of the loftiest immortals. How can one not be exhorted? How can one not be diligent?

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: Should one violate the covenant by reckless transmission, or fail to observe the prescribed years, or transmit without the proper oath, the sin will extend to seven generations—bound to the stones of Lianshan, piled into the River of Eternal Night, never to be absolved for ten thousand kalpas. One’s own body will also perish; how then can immortality be expected? Be vigilant and prudent.

Here ends *The Supreme Scripture of the Numinous Treasure: The Esoteric Contemplation of Soaring Flight Through the Three Realms and Penetrating the Subtle*.

chunks.original_text: 太上洞玄灵宝飞行三界通微内思妙经 经名：太上洞玄灵宝飞行三界通微内思妙经。 撰人不详，约出於南北朝或隋唐。 灵宝经目着录未出。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》太平部。 太上洞玄灵宝飞行三界通微内思妙经 太极真人曰：太上灵宝飞行三界隐存上道，能长斋修行，百日之中，诸疾皆除，颜色光明，白发复黑，齿堕更生。 行之二百日，髓满骨填，肠化为筋，瘢炙灭去，拘蹇屈伸，喑痾盲聋，能令见闻。 行之三百日，出入无间，役使鬼神，腾身虚空，足蹑浮云，恣意所行，去彼昆仑。 行之三年，得道成真，游宴八极，骖驾麒麟，白虎援据，青龙掩尘。 行之五年，招游三界，位登仙王。 兹言之妙，道由人弘，岂其游说，寔皇存弘之，道存人亡。 大哉，太上灵宝之韫囿乎。 太极真人曰：灵宝太真景阳丹阳感阳登天玉符，太上秘之玉京山金阙上宫。 非有仙相，位应为仙王、仙公、仙卿者不传。 子若遇之，将宿命玄会，已标名上清，赍信告盟而受也。 太极真人曰：师弟子先各斋三十日，又对斋三日，每令恶尽，推求虚灵，亦当有感於当时，然后书符佩服而行事焉。 太极真人曰：服食炼炁吐纳精，存神静默带太真。 太极真人曰：入室三七见真灵，变化立亡易短长，移源塞流服景阳。 太极真人曰：水炼八石定黄金，煎沙腾奏吞丹阴。 太极真人曰：思心神道存仙游，期迹希想服感阳。 太极真人曰：符虚渺茫望明岳，愿仰看云思天泽，欲升云虚衔登天。 太极真人曰：道成尽佩凌华岳，上造天阶乃顿服。 服食炼炁吐纳精，存神静默带太真，入室三七见真灵。 灵宝太真阴 太极真人曰：法用玉囊，请佩之，不得履秽。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当以甲子、甲戌、甲申、甲午、甲辰、甲寅之日，入斋堂，东向叩齿，心存曰：苍林玄象，流水如何，炎火周身，安能知他，道来归我，冲炁自和。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当壬申、壬午、壬辰、壬寅、壬子、壬戌、癸酉、癸未、癸巳、癸丑、癸亥、癸卯之日，入斋堂，北向叩齿，心存曰：愿睹天镜，玄滋玉池，还白使黑，常为婴儿，神来归我，五藏相随。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当以庚午、庚辰、庚寅、庚子、庚戌、庚申、辛未、辛巳、辛卯、辛丑、辛酉、辛亥之日，入斋堂，西向叩齿，心存曰：本子本子，白云本起，〔白云本起，〕 雾合万里，愿灵来归，留与我使，反覆本运，终而复始。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当以丙寅、丙子、丙戌、丙申、丙午、丙辰、丁卯、丁丑、丁亥、丁酉、丁未、丁巳之日，入斋堂，南向叩齿，心存曰：朱雀丹池，天海地河，愿得不死，饮食至和，寿均二仪，所期万多。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当以戊辰、戊寅、戊子、戊戌、戊申、戊午、己巳、己卯、己丑、己亥、己酉、己未之日，入斋堂，东向安外，平枕叩齿，心存曰：天道天道，愿得不老，寿比中黄，升日常蚤，愿延其命，与道长久。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，夫六甲之日，魄游玄宫，当此之日，念於心中有一神人，被服白光，状如玉女。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，夫六癸之日，魂在膀胱，伏念肾中神人朱光，形象玉童。

**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of Soaring Through the Three Realms and Communing with Subtle Inner Contemplation**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture of Soaring Through the Three Realms and Communing with Subtle Inner Contemplation*. Author unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties or the Sui-Tang period. Not recorded in the *Catalogue of Numinous Treasure Scriptures*. One scroll. Base text from the *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity Tradition*, Peace Section.

---

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
The Supreme Numinous Treasure enables flight through the Three Realms and the concealed preservation of the Supreme Dao. Those who maintain a prolonged fast and cultivate practice for a hundred days will find all illnesses dispelled, their complexion radiant, white hair restored to black, and fallen teeth regrown. After two hundred days of practice, marrow fills the bones, the intestines transform into sinews, scars and burns vanish, and stiffness, muteness, blindness, and deafness are cured, restoring sight and hearing. After three hundred days, one may pass through barriers without obstruction, command ghosts and spirits, ascend into the void, tread upon floating clouds, and roam freely to reach the Kunlun Mountains. After three years, one attains the Dao and achieves Perfection, wandering the Eight Extremities, riding a chariot drawn by qilin, with white tigers as attendants and azure dragons sweeping the dust. After five years, one summons and roams the Three Realms, ascending to the rank of Immortal King.

The subtlety of these words lies in the Dao being magnified through human effort. How could this be mere idle discourse? Truly, the Emperor upholds and magnifies it, for the Dao endures while humanity perishes. How vast is the treasury of the Supreme Numinous Treasure!

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
The *Numinous Treasure Supreme Perfected Scarlet Yang Elixir of the Sun’s Radiance, Jade Token for Ascending to Heaven*, is secretly preserved in the Golden Tower of the Jade Capital Mountain in the Upper Palace. It is not transmitted to those without the destiny of immortality—only to those whose rank corresponds to Immortal King, Immortal Duke, or Immortal Minister. If you encounter this, it is because your predestined karmic affinity has been recorded in the Upper Clarity, and you must present credentials and swear an oath to receive it.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Master and disciple must each observe a thirty-day fast, followed by a three-day joint fast. Expel all impurities, seek emptiness and numinosity, and await a response in that very moment. Only then may you inscribe the talisman, wear it, and proceed with the practice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Consume and refine qi, exhale and inhale essence, preserve the spirit in stillness, and gird yourself with the Supreme Perfected.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
After twenty-one days in seclusion, you will behold the Perfected Spirits. Transformation occurs in an instant—short and long shift, sources are moved, flows are blocked, and the Scarlet Yang is ingested.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Refine the Eight Stones with water to fix gold, boil sand to ascend, and swallow the Yin of the Elixir.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Contemplate the spirit of the Dao in your heart, dwell in immortal wanderings, and await the traces of longing to ingest the Responsive Yang.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
The talisman is ethereal and distant—gaze toward the luminous peaks, yearn upward to watch the clouds and think of celestial blessings, desiring to ascend the void and ride the clouds to reach Heaven.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
When the Dao is achieved, you will wear all its emblems and ascend Mount Hua. Only upon reaching the celestial steps may you suddenly ingest it.

Consume and refine qi, exhale and inhale essence, preserve the spirit in stillness, and gird yourself with the Supreme Perfected. After twenty-one days in seclusion, you will behold the Perfected Spirits.

---

**The Yin of the Supreme Perfected Numinous Treasure**

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
Use a jade pouch to request and wear it; do not tread upon defilement.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Jiazi, Jiaxu, Jiashen, Jiawu, Jiachen, and Jiayin, enter the fasting hall, face east, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Verdant forests and mysterious images, flowing waters—how do they fare? Fire blazes around the body—how can others know? The Dao comes to me, and the primordial qi harmonizes naturally."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Renshen, Renwu, Renchen, Renyin, Renzi, Renxu, Guiyou, Guiwei, Guisi, Guichou, Guihai, and Guimao, enter the fasting hall, face north, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"I wish to behold the Heavenly Mirror, the mysterious nourishment of the Jade Pool. Restore white to black, and remain ever an infant. The spirits come to me, and the Five Viscera follow."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Gengwu, Gengchen, Gengyin, Gengzi, Gengxu, Gengshen, Xinwei, Xinsi, Xinmao, Xinchou, Xinyou, and Xinhai, enter the fasting hall, face west, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Root child, root child, white clouds arise originally. Mist gathers across ten thousand leagues. May the numinous come to me, abide, and serve me. Return to the original movement, ending and beginning anew."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Bingyin, Bingzi, Bingxu, Bingshen, Bingwu, Bingchen, Dingmao, Dingchou, Dinghai, Dingyou, Dingwei, and Dingsi, enter the fasting hall, face south, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Vermilion Bird, Scarlet Pool, Heavenly Sea, Earthly River. I wish for immortality, to partake of perfect harmony, to match the Two Modes in longevity, and to attain ten thousandfold aspirations."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of Wuchen, Wuyin, Wuzi, Wuxu, Wushen, Wuwu, Jisi, Jimao, Jichou, Jihai, Jiyou, and Jiwei, enter the fasting hall, face east, lie down with a level pillow, and knock the teeth. Visualize in your heart: *"Heavenly Dao, Heavenly Dao, I wish for agelessness, to match the Yellow Center in longevity, to rise with the sun at dawn. May my life be prolonged, and may I endure with the Dao."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of the Six Jia, when the po wanders the Mysterious Palace, visualize in your heart a divine person clad in white radiance, resembling a Jade Maiden.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the days of the Six Gui, when the hun resides in the Bladder, concentrate on the divine person within the kidneys, whose crimson radiance resembles a Jade Youth.

chunks.original_text: 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，夫人有五心，其要最密，一名五门子。 常念心中若一人，主神仙之元，左手太初，右手太素，左足为朝，右足为暮，皆有赤炁。 名曰元公，此是五帝之舍。 肺为石室，肝为兰台，心印金，肾印银。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以立春之日清斋，东向咒曰：东方青牙，服食青牙，饮食朝华。 朝华在唇表，因三咽之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以立夏之日清斋，南向咒曰：南方朱丹，服食朱丹，饮以丹池。 丹池在唇内，因三咽之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以四季之月清斋，向王咒曰：中央黄野，昂昂太山，服食元气，饮以醴泉。 醴泉在舌上悬膺，因三咽之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以立秋之日清斋，向西咒曰：西方明石，服食明石，饮以灵液。 灵液在齿上，因三咽之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以立冬之日清斋，北向咒曰：北方玄滋，服食玄滋，饮以玉饴。 玉饴在舌下，因三咽之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以夜半，上思丹池神水、白云五色炁，出来入玄门，下通肾中三道，上行径入绛宫，浮游华盖，还入泥丸。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常以月朔日、五日、十五日、二十五日、甲午、丙午、戊午日，平日一至日中，向日披发，偃卧暝目，心存视日若太阳，还归绛宫，与我合德，俱养绛宫。 於是因念心中有玄盖，盖下有日，日中有一人，名曰太乙玉女，小童之身，赤炁周行，绕日三十周，至日中止。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当食日之精，常思心中正赤如日，赤炁四布，遍一身体。 思念心中有日，日中有玄盖，盖下有三人，左为太初元先，右为太乙南极元阳，中为赤子小 童，左为玉女老子夫人，常持金盘玉椀，神酒饮我，神丹芝草食之，久久六丁神来到。 常以平旦行之，至日中而止。 太玄神上入泥丸，赤炁头中脑，径入口中，绕口九周止，赤炁下入绛宫，径至丹田赤炁，与之合并。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常食月之精。 常念玄光玉女来出神水上正立，白炁在神龟上止，戴大明星，光照身体。 夜半行之，至日中止。 入於太渊，与太乙合符，灵复来下，人定时，入於弱水中，上昆仑山上，夜半复沐浴丹池中，元炁平行，上神龟上呼吸，名曰元一。 晦朔望日时，亦存之，常念肾间有大神龟，文彩五色，状如总丝，上有玄光，下有神水，肾间白炁绕身一周，左日右月，次於上元。 常以晦朔八节之日，咒曰：司录六丁玉女，削去某死籍，十二大夫皆言，如灵宝大法科令。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当食斗之精。 常念脾中黄炁，上有北斗七星，黄神玄女，形长三寸，上思北斗太清七星，黄炁入我口中，下匝一身，混沌合并。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当食星之精，太极中央明星之精。 常念绛宫小童赤如日，三人并立，太乙赤炁上升泥丸。 因念额三星，大如鸡子赤如日，赤炁入日与神连，黄精入口至太玄。 常以甲午、丙午日，日中时。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当以夜半，上思太极斗中有八星，八魁正圆，中有赤衣人，文彩五色，即吾身也。

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, every person possesses five hearts, their essence most profound, collectively called the Five Gate Child. Constantly visualize within your heart a single being, the primordial origin of divine transcendence. In their left hand, the Primordial Beginning; in their right, the Primordial Simplicity. Their left foot marks dawn; their right, dusk—both suffused with crimson qi. This is called the Primordial Lord, the abode of the Five Emperors. The lungs are the Stone Chamber; the liver, the Orchid Terrace. The heart’s seal is gold; the kidneys’ seal, silver.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring), purify yourself in fasting and face east, reciting the incantation: *"Eastern Azure Tooth, consume the Azure Tooth, drink the morning’s blossom."* The morning’s blossom lies beyond the lips—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Lixia* (Beginning of Summer), purify yourself in fasting and face south, reciting the incantation: *"Southern Vermilion Cinnabar, consume the Vermilion Cinnabar, drink from the Cinnabar Pool."* The Cinnabar Pool lies within the lips—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the months of the four seasons, purify yourself in fasting and face the sovereign, reciting the incantation: *"Central Yellow Wilds, towering Great Mountain, consume the primordial qi, drink from the Sweet Spring."* The Sweet Spring hangs above the suspended breastbone—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Liqiu* (Beginning of Autumn), purify yourself in fasting and face west, reciting the incantation: *"Western Luminous Stone, consume the Luminous Stone, drink the numinous fluid."* The numinous fluid rests upon the teeth—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the day of *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter), purify yourself in fasting and face north, reciting the incantation: *"Northern Mystic Essence, consume the Mystic Essence, drink the Jade Nectar."* The Jade Nectar lies beneath the tongue—swallow thrice.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, at midnight, visualize above the Cinnabar Pool the divine water and the five-colored qi of white clouds emerging from the Mysterious Gate, descending through the three pathways of the kidneys, ascending directly into the Crimson Palace, drifting beneath the Flowery Canopy, and returning to the Muddy Pellet.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, on the first day of the lunar month, the fifth, fifteenth, twenty-fifth, *Jiawu*, *Bingwu*, and *Wuwu* days, from dawn until noon, face the sun with unbound hair, lie supine with eyes closed, and visualize the sun as if it were the great solar orb, returning to the Crimson Palace to merge its virtue with yours, both nourishing the Crimson Palace. Then, visualize within your heart the Mysterious Canopy, beneath which lies the sun, and within the sun, a being called the Supreme Unity Jade Maiden, her form that of a youthful child, crimson qi circulating around the sun thirty times before halting at its center.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the sun. Constantly visualize your heart as radiant crimson like the sun, its crimson qi spreading in all directions, suffusing your entire body. Envision within your heart the sun, and within the sun, the Mysterious Canopy. Beneath the canopy stand three figures: on the left, the Primordial Beginning; on the right, the Supreme Unity of the Southern Culmen; and in the center, the Crimson Child. To your left, the Jade Maiden, consort of the Old Master, bearing a golden platter and jade bowl, offering divine wine and feeding you divine elixirs and sacred mushrooms. With time, the Six Ding spirits will arrive. Practice this from dawn until noon. The Supreme Mystery spirit ascends into the Muddy Pellet, the crimson qi entering the brain within the head, circling the mouth nine times before halting. The crimson qi descends into the Crimson Palace, proceeding directly to the Cinnabar Field, where it merges with the qi there.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the moon. Constantly visualize the Mystic Radiance Jade Maiden emerging above the divine water, standing upright, white qi resting upon the Numinous Tortoise, crowned with the Great Bright Star, its light illuminating your body. Practice this from midnight until noon. Enter the Great Abyss to merge with the Supreme Unity, the numinous descending once more. At the hour of *Renshen* (person’s hour), enter the Weak Waters, ascend Kunlun Mountain, and at midnight, bathe again in the Cinnabar Pool. The primordial qi flows evenly, ascending above the Numinous Tortoise to breathe—this is called the Primordial Unity. On the days of the new moon, full moon, and last day of the lunar month, also visualize thus: within the kidneys, a great Numinous Tortoise, its patterns five-colored, its form like woven silk, above it Mystic Radiance, below it divine water. White qi from the kidneys encircles the body once, the sun to the left, the moon to the right, ascending to the Upper Prime. On the days of the new moon, full moon, and the eight seasonal nodes, recite the incantation: *"Recorder of the Six Ding Jade Maidens, erase my name from the register of death. The Twelve Great Officers all proclaim: As decreed by the statutes of the Great Numinous Treasure."*

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the Dipper. Constantly visualize within the spleen the yellow qi, above which lie the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper. The Yellow Spirit Mystic Maiden, three inches in height, ascends to contemplate the Seven Stars of the Supreme Clarity of the Northern Dipper. The yellow qi enters your mouth, descending to envelop your entire body, merging in primordial chaos.

The Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate declares:
To cultivate the Dao of *Soaring Through the Three Realms of the Numinous Treasure*, consume the essence of the stars, the essence of the Central Bright Star of the Supreme Ultimate. Constantly visualize within the Crimson Palace a youthful child, crimson as the sun, three figures standing together. The Supreme Unity’s crimson qi ascends to the Muddy Pellet. chunks.original_text: 常以八节之日，立春、春分、立夏、夏至、立秋、秋分、立冬、冬至、腊正、除夕，人定时，入斋堂北向高座，礼三宝十方。 先北方，次东方，次南方，次西方，次西北方，次上方，次东 北方，次东南方，次下方，次西南方，方一拜。 次又礼大圣众，四方，方三拜，回旋都毕。 言曰：三景弟子某甲，少好大道，愿得长生，今日愿太一北君、司命、司录削去某死籍，更着长生录籍。 於是因卧念五城十二楼，十二大夫在中央，衣朱衣，河水流通，分布四肢。 又咒曰：司录六丁玉女，削去某死简，更着长生神仙玉籍。 度名青箓，於今必获迈迹三界，遨游九外。 毕。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当先行江河。 常念怒云郁勃，徘徊为江河，大肠为江，小肠为河，胞为弱水，人生之根，玉水玄妙，江河至神。 毕。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当行元炁。 常以癸亥、甲子、晦朔之日，夜半时，下思弱水怒云纷纷，上出肾间，白炁并合上行，经历五宫，上入泥丸，下入涌泉，周遍身体，因念玄光玉女正从中道来上，上戴明星上行，身中皆明，元炁四布，至鸡鸣毕。 太极真人曰：当行易益之道。 当以甲子、癸亥、八节之日，立春、春分、．立夏、夏至、立秋、秋分、立冬、冬至，夜半之时，入斋堂，念弱水中元炁郁郁漂漂，出上华盖，云行雨施，周遍一身。 於是便因念太一小童玉女，凡三人，紫房道君下灌丹田，玉池青水，上生华光。 乃念太清元炁纷纷如云雾，来下入身中，郁郁如云入山，万世常存。 毕。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当行门户。 常以月朔一日至十五日，入斋堂静思，手十指为门户，元炁径注至十指，皆热。 魂从中出，引使来还，九十息止。 从十六日至月晦思之，十指元炁下至足十指，皆热，九息止。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当行玄化。 常以癸亥之日，人定之时，入斋堂下，念玄太文中倒住人，方长七寸，思行玄卯乾燥如黄，因复念玄来正黑，行引其色，润泽有光，至夜半止。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，当思日中黄精赤炁来下入口中，咽之三九止。 止便咒曰：日帝君，月夫人，神乎神乎，还归绛宫，俱养小童，太一玉女，无离其宫。 凡三咒文，思肺中白炁来上至口中，咽之三七而止。 又咒曰：鸿达得道，太白子期，与我合德，长生不死。 三过毕。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常当思心中有十二芝茎，正赤玉色，上与肺连，名曰思箭。 以意把之，太一引怒，心中正圆，名曰威喜。 此乃天神太一、道太一。 常存守百思，可精念之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常当思心赤炁下行，与肾相连。 常念肾间白炁上入心中，心中赤炁下行入肾，间中有白炁上行，万世不绝，名曰阴阳元炁也。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常当存太一紫绶金印，带玉华符。 印名威喜，天帝信玺。 凡有七人带剑持符，行在前，止在后，坐在左，卧在右，恒念存之。 太极真人曰：修灵宝飞行三界之道，常当行中极。 存脾上黄人，形长三寸，两手中各有一黄人，黄炁上通天，下入身体，即见其神，便咒曰：黄裳子，黄裳子，黄庭真人在吾己，为我取醴酒肥脯、神仙芝草、诸可饮食者。

Visualize the ten fingers as gates and doors, with primordial qi flowing directly into them until all grow warm. The hun-soul emerges from within, guiding it to come and go. Cease after ninety breaths. From the sixteenth to the last day of the month, visualize the primordial qi descending to the ten toes until all grow warm. Cease after nine breaths.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must practice the Way of Mystic Transformation. On the day of *guihai*, at the hour of *rending*, enter the purification hall and visualize the inverted figure within the Mystic Grand Scripture, seven *cun* in height. Visualize the Mystic Mao and Qian as dry and yellow, then visualize the Mystic Lai as true black, its color drawn forth, moist and radiant. Cease at midnight.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must visualize the yellow essence and red qi of the sun descending into the mouth. Swallow it twenty-seven times. Then recite the incantation: "Lord of the Sun, Lady of the Moon, divine, divine! Return to the Crimson Palace, together nurturing the Jade Maidens of the Grand Unity, never departing from their palace." Recite this incantation three times. Then visualize the white qi from the lungs ascending to the mouth and swallow it twenty-one times. Next, recite the incantation: "Hongda attained the Dao; Taibai Ziqī, unite with me in virtue, that I may live long and never die." Recite this three times.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly visualize twelve stalks of lingzhi within the heart, their color a true vermilion jade, connected above to the lungs. This is called the "Thought Arrow." Grasp it with intention, and the Grand Unity’s wrath is drawn forth. The heart’s true roundness is called "Majestic Joy." These are the Celestial Grand Unity and the Dao Grand Unity. Constantly guard and contemplate them with focused attention.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly visualize the red qi of the heart descending to connect with the kidneys. Constantly visualize the white qi between the kidneys ascending into the heart, while the heart’s red qi descends into the kidneys. Between them, white qi ascends unceasingly for ten thousand generations. This is called the "Primordial Qi of Yin and Yang."

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly visualize the Grand Unity’s purple sash and golden seal, bearing the Jade Flower Talisman. The seal is called "Majestic Joy," the Heavenly Emperor’s trustworthy signet. Seven figures, each bearing a sword and holding a talisman, walk before you, halt behind you, sit to your left, and lie to your right. Constantly visualize and maintain this awareness.

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: In cultivating the Dao of soaring flight through the Three Realms, one must constantly practice the Way of the Central Ultimate. Visualize the yellow figure above the spleen, three *cun* in height, with a yellow figure in each hand. Yellow qi ascends to heaven and descends into the body. Upon seeing this spirit, recite the incantation: "Yellow-robed one, Yellow-robed one, the Perfected One of the Yellow Court is within me. Fetch for me sweet wine, rich meats, divine lingzhi herbs, and all that may be consumed."

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: The Supreme Dao of the Numinous Treasure’s hidden journey and soaring flight through the Three Realms cannot be sought without authenticity, nor learned without the Way. If one cultivates with precision for five years, one may transcend and wander the Three Realms, ascending to the Jade Capital—this is the utmost subtlety of the Three Caverns, the crown of all scriptures. Those who cultivate it should purify their hearts and sever all external entanglements. If one fails to do so, even after years of accumulation, nothing will be gained, and one will merely waste their years in vain observation—how lamentable!

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: The transmission of the covenant must adhere to the fivefold invocation of the ancient statutes, the jade instructions, and essential teachings. One must separately present three taels of refined gold and a bolt of life-thread silk, its length matching the recipient’s age. If you can study diligently, you may become a guest of the Supreme Lord, roaming the golden palaces and attaining the ranks of the loftiest immortals. How can one not be exhorted? How can one not be diligent?

The Perfected One of the Great Ultimate said: Should one violate the covenant by reckless transmission, or fail to observe the prescribed years, or transmit without the proper oath, the sin will extend to seven generations—bound to the stones of Lianshan, piled into the River of Eternal Night, never to be absolved for ten thousand kalpas. One’s own body will also perish; how then can immortality be expected? Be vigilant and prudent.

Here ends *The Supreme Scripture of the Numinous Treasure: The Esoteric Contemplation of Soaring Flight Through the Three Realms and Penetrating the Subtle*.
